name: delta-unified
description: Unified Delta Indonesia platform (PIC, CRM, Inventory, Landing Page)

scripts.clean: turbo run clean && find . -type d -name node_modules -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.db:push: cd packages/database && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd packages/database && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate-prod: cd packages/database && npx prisma migrate deploy

author: Delta Indonesia
